dialog_lines.line: Well isn't it my good friend Splish! I hear you have carved out a name for yourself in our little isles.
Have the boys been bothering you? I'll give them a talking to and they shouldn’t bother you anymore.
When was the last time you visited home, Finbury? I have some valuables that I may have borrowed without permission.
I need a place to store them, for safe keeping, so would you help a friend out?
Oh, do you remember when we were little tikes and my family forgot my birthday?
But you remembered. You bright me that pie. I never did thank you.
Where did you get it from anyway? Oh it doesn’t matter. Blueberry is my favorite.
